name: The Passing Years
description: A collection of poetry following the Churches year and the passage of time. A truly inspirational collection.

name: One Step at a Time E-Book Edition
description:
This copy of One Step at a Time is in 'e pub' format and ready to be read in most ebook readers, except Kindle. The file will be emailed to you within 24hours of completing this sale. If you do not receive it please email me immediately.

A Kindle version is available from Amazon Kindle.

name: One Step at a Time
description:
One Step At A Time by Martin Hogan is an account of how hundreds of adults and young people came into a real and living relationship with the Lord Jesus Christ through the ministry and fellowship of The Group.

The Group was a weekly Bible study and prayer group led by Dawson Price, which began in  1967 and continued through to 1999. The book contains many testimonies and stories written down both at the time and more recently.

The purpose of this book is to give this, and future generations, an accurate account of these wonderful days which shaped the lives and ministries of so many people, and to encourage them to step out in faith and take the good news boldly to the ends of the earth.

ISBN: 0-9549273-1-1
